description: Straight sets, number of sets times the number of reps.
Straight sets, number of sets times the number of reps.
Each set you increase the number of reps. After the the given number of rounds you decrease the number of reps per set.
Each set you increase the number of reps. After the the given number of rounds you decrease the number of reps per set.
High number of sets with very few reps. Very short breaks in between.
